Title: Jukebox Anywhere
Description:
Use the Expedition Jukebox during gameplay! This was an idea originally suggested by Niaveterror815 on the Vinki server, but I think it's something we've all been wanting!

[h3]Features:[/h3][list]
[*]Play songs from the jukebox anywhere during gameplay
[*]Optionally turn off the Expedition requirements for unlocking songs
[*]Optionally add modded songs to the jukebox (does not include treat themes)
[/list]

[h3]Recommended Mods:[/h3][list]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3237307999&searchtext=audio+fixe]Audio Fix[/url]: For getting rid of weird sound issues
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2924356705&searchtext=music+announcements]Music Announcements[/url]: See what songs are triggered by the game so that it's easy to find them later!
[/list]

[h3]Known Bugs and Incompatible Mods:[/h3][list]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2977508597&searchtext=merge+fix]Merge Fix[/url]: (Yes, for real lol) Nothing major - for some reason it converts all of the modded song names to lowercase in the Jukebox
[/list]

[h2]If you find any bugs or want to suggest features, please let us know on [url=https://discord.gg/hqpBUTrNzh]The Vinki discord server[/url], or [b]@OlayColay[/b] on the [url=https://discord.gg/rainworld]Rain World server[/url]![/h2]

Thank you to Beep for the thumbnail, and MaxDubstep for the gen alpha attention grabber screenshot!
